GenomeTools
===========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which GenomeTools installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using GenomeTools, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load GenomeTools/1.6.2-GCC-12.2.0
```
